about_the_game:
The all original soundtrack created by renowned musician CHIPZEL.

Chipzel is the alias of Niamh Houston, a London based independent chip-musician from Northern Ireland who indulges in the use of Gameboys to create energetic, melodic dance tracks.


TRACKS

1- Interstellaria (title)
2- Prelude
3- Home Sweet Home (tutorial)
4 - Serenity
5- Mankind Will Prevail
6 - Human Diplomacy
7 - Never Tell Me the Odds (part 1)
8 - Victory
9 - Recovery
10 - I Wanna Take You To the Space Bar
11 - Sakari
12 - Xiwang
13 - Never Tell Me The Odds (part 2)
14 - The Kursha Will Rise Again
15 - Kursha Diplomacy
16 - Cylus
17 - Revive, Rebuild, Repent
18 - Suna Diplomacy
19 - Ghfi
20 - Life Finds A Way
21 - Anoa Diplomacy
22 - Oloke
23 - God Gives Us Strength
24 - Kaidun Diplomacy
25 - Aibit
26 - Gadaad
27 - Friendly Diplomacy
28 - Friendly Encounter
29 - New Terra
30 - Station Horizon
31 - Annihilation
32 - No One Will Know Your Story
33 - Black Holes, Black Flags
34 - Pirate Diplomacy
35 - Brand
36 - Ulu
37 - Ott
38 - Live By The Sword
39 - Let's End This
40 - The Alliance
41 - End Campaign
42 - Credits
43 - We Will Find Peace
44 - Cosmic Rays
45 - Eclipse
46 - Lose In Space
47 - Positive Anomaly
48 - Mysterious Anomaly
49 - Negative Anomaly
50 - Crew member Dies
51 - Message From Trade Co
52 - Nemesis Encounter
53 - Unknown Anomaly
54 - Somnolence
